entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Light snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
